issue.title: [CF 557] Shaman Shock Range Check
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create an icon to monitor the cooldown of any Shaman shock spell.
2. Add the Range Check option.
3. Enter combat and use any shock. Wait for the cooldown to expire, then use another shock spell (it can be the same shock).

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Expected: As after the first use, the ability will be shown to be on cooldown.
Actual Result: Icon stays fully activated (does not show that the ability is on cooldown).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v6.0.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
The full string I'm attempting to use:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SDurationAlpha^N0.2 ^SName^SEarth~`Shock ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^SRangeCheck^B ^t^N60101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

A smaller string for testing purposes:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SEarth~`Shock ^SRangeCheck^B ^t^N60101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user sirtyface | Imported from CurseForge issue #557 | Raw

comments.body:
It seems to be working OK for me. Could you post some screenshots showing the problem in action?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I did some additional testing this morning: - The problem only occurs when editing the Range Check property in the same session; relogging or reloading the UI will fix the problem. - It has nothing to do with the other settings. For instance, turning off the Usable property (with the Unusable property on) causes the icon to simply not show. - As I mentioned in my ticket, the cooldown shows properly after the very first cast, but not on subsequent casts. - It is not related to interaction with another addon (I tested by turning all other addons off).

I've uploaded an image of my TMW window (which does not show the Earth Shock CD) and my actionbars (showing the cooldown on Earth Shock and Frost Shock):

And the exact string I got the screenshot with: ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SDurationAlpha^N0.2 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SRangeCheck^B ^SEnabled^B ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SDurationMax^N1.5 ^SName^SEarth`Shock ^t^N60101^S`| ^Sicon^^

Hopefully this helps.


> Posted by CurseForge user sirtyface

Still can't reproduce it. Could you upgrade to v6.0.2 and see if the issue still persists?

I tried

  • importing the string
    • toggling the range setting after importing
    • not toggling the range setting after importing
  • reloading with range check both on and off and then toggling it after logging in
  • creating an icon from scratch, both with range check enabled and disabled
    • toggling the range check setting on these icons after casting shock a few times

Couldn't reproduce under any circumstances.

Edited Aug 30, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just looked back through the diffs in the repo, and the issue was definitely fixed sometime between 6.0.1 and 6.0.2. Upgrading to 6.0.2 will definitely fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
